fuse.compat

Class Filesystem1ToFilesystem2Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuse.compat.Filesystem1ToFilesystem2Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filesystem2, FilesystemConstants

    public class Filesystem1ToFilesystem2Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filesystem2
    This is an adapter that adapts the oldest path-only based compatibility filesystem API (fuse.compat.Filesystem1) to the old filehandle enabled API (fuse.compat.Filesystem2)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fuse.FilesystemConstants

        O_RDONLY, O_RDWR, O_WRONLY

    • Constructor Summary
